Package me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.fieldMapping

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.fieldMapping.Geometry
  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Geometry-related utilities.

    Of course it's all static. It's all the same. It's just a bunch of random geometry-related utilities. Yay.

    Author:
    Colin Robertson

        public static boolean isNearPoint​(Coordinate<java.lang.Double> test,
                                  Coordinate<java.lang.Double> base,
                                  double tolerance)
        Determine whether or not a point is within a given proximity to another point.
        Parameters:
        test - the point to test.
        base - the point which is used as a base.
        tolerance - how far the two points can be.
        Returns:
        whether or not the two points are within a given proximity.
